metadata.Title: CVE-2021-38206 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: The mac80211 subsystem in the Linux kernel before 5.12.13, when a devicesupporting only 5 GHz is used, allows attackers to cause a denial ofservice (NULL pointer dereference in the radiotap parser) by injecting aframe with 802.11a rates.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
